title: Biz Journal's 2017 Ultimate Attorney Award winners - Jacksonville Business Journal

organizations.name: est industries & tags lifetime achievment howard coker - coker

text: Biz Journal's 2017 Ultimate Attorney Award winners Feb 17, 2017, 12:11pm EST Updated Feb 17, 2017, 2:02pm EST Industries & Tags Lifetime Achievment Howard Coker - Coker, Schickel, Sorenson, Posgay, Camerlengo &… more For the second year, the Jacksonville Business Journal is honoring the top attorneys on the First Coast. Looking across a variety of legal fields and with the help of the local legal community, the Business Journal selected 21 lawyers who stand out when it comes to serving their clients and the community. These attorneys will be honored at a March 7 event. 21 photos Lifetime Achievment Howard Coker - Coker, Schickel, Sorenson, Posgay, Camerlengo &… more Click through the gallery to take a look at the men and women who have been selected for the 2017 class.
